   16: -module(connect_SUITE).
   17: 
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
   27: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   28:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   29:      || (E) =/= (V)])).
   30: -define(SECURE_USER, secure_joe).
   31: -define(CERT_FILE, "priv/ssl/fake_server.pem").
   32: -define(TLS_VERSIONS, ["tlsv1", "tlsv1.1", "tlsv1.2"]).
   33: 
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: %% Suite configuration
   36: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: 
   38: all() ->
   39:     AuthMods = mongoose_helper:auth_modules(),
   40:     case lists:member(ejabberd_auth_external, AuthMods) of
   41:         true ->
   42:             {skip, "Conf reload doesn't work correctly with sample external auth"};
   43:         _ ->
   44:             [{group, c2s_noproc}, %% should be first, uses vanilla config
   45:              {group, negative},
   46:              {group, pre_xmpp_1_0},
   47:              {group, starttls},
   48:              {group, feature_order},
   49:              {group, tls},
   50:              {group, ciphers_default},
   51:              {group, 'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'}]
   52:     end.
   53: 
   54: groups() ->
   55:     [{c2s_noproc, [], [reset_stream_noproc,
   56:                        starttls_noproc,
   57:                        compress_noproc]},
   58:      {negative, [], [bad_xml,
   59:                      invalid_host,
   60:                      invalid_stream_namespace]},
   61:      {pre_xmpp_1_0, [], [pre_xmpp_1_0_stream]},
   62:      {starttls, test_cases()},
   63:      {feature_order, [parallel], [stream_features_test,
   64:                       tls_authenticate,
   65:                       tls_compression_fail,
   66:                       tls_compression_authenticate_fail,
   67:                       tls_authenticate_compression,
   68:                       auth_compression_bind_session,
   69:                       auth_bind_compression_session]},
   70:      {tls, generate_tls_vsn_tests()},
   71:      {ciphers_default, [], [clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers,
   72:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA',
   73:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA']},
   74:      {'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', [],
   75:       %% node2 accepts DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA exclusively (see ejabberd.cfg)
   76:       ['clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only']}].
   77: 
   78: test_cases() ->
   79:     generate_tls_vsn_tests() ++
   80:     [should_fail_with_sslv3,
   81:      should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls,
   82:      should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required].
   83: 
   84: suite() ->
   85:     escalus:suite().
   86: 
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: %% Init & teardown
   89: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   90: 
   91: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   92:     Config0 = escalus:init_per_suite([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd, []}} | Config]),
   93:     Config1 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config0),
   94:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Config1),
   95:     assert_cert_file_exists(),
   96:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([?SECURE_USER, alice])).
   97: 
   98: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   99:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([?SECURE_USER, alice])),
  100:     restore_ejabberd_node(Config),
  101:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  102: 
  103: init_per_group(c2s_noproc, Config) ->
  104:     Config;
  105: init_per_group(starttls, Config) ->
  106:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config,
  107:                              fun mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern/0),
  108:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  109:     Config;
  110: init_per_group(tls, Config) ->
  111:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  112:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  113:     Users = proplists:get_value(escalus_users, Config, []),
  114:     JoeSpec = lists:keydelete(starttls, 1, proplists:get_value(?SECURE_USER, Users)),
  115:     JoeSpec2 = {?SECURE_USER, lists:keystore(ssl, 1, JoeSpec, {ssl, true})},
  116:     NewUsers = lists:keystore(?SECURE_USER, 1, Users, JoeSpec2),
  117:     lists:keystore(escalus_users, 1, Config, {escalus_users, NewUsers});
  118: init_per_group(feature_order, Config) ->
  119:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_compression_config_pattern/0),
  120:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  121:     Config;
  122: init_per_group(ciphers_default, Config) ->
  123:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  124:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  125:     [{c2s_port, 5222} | Config];
  126: init_per_group('node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', Config) ->
  127:     [{c2s_port, 5233} | Config];
  128: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  129:     Config.
  130: end_per_group(feature_order, Config) ->
  131:     escalus_fresh:clean(),
  132:     Config;
  133: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  134:     Config.
  135: 
  136: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  137:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  138: 
  139: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  140:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  141: 
  142: generate_tls_vsn_tests() ->
  143:     [list_to_existing_atom("should_pass_with_" ++ VSN)
  144:      || VSN <- ?TLS_VERSIONS].
  145: 
  146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  147: %% Tests
  148: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  149: 
  150: bad_xml(Config) ->
  151:     %% given
  152:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  153:     %% when
  154:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_bad_xml(Spec),
  155:     %% then
  156:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  157:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  158:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  159:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"xml-not-well-formed">>, <<>>], Error),
  160:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  161: 
  162: invalid_host(Config) ->
  163:     %% given
  164:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  165:     %% when
  166:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_to_invalid_host(Spec),
  167:     %% then
  168:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  169:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  170:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  171:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"host-unknown">>, <<>>], Error),
  172:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  173: 
  174: invalid_stream_namespace(Config) ->
  175:     %% given
  176:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  177:     %% when
  178:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec),
  179:     %% then
  180:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  181:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"invalid-namespace">>, <<>>], Error),
  182:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  183: 
  184: pre_xmpp_1_0_stream(Config) ->
  185:     %% given
  186:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  187:     Steps = [
  188:              %% when
  189:              {legacy_stream_helper, start_stream_pre_xmpp_1_0},
  190:              {legacy_stream_helper, failed_legacy_auth}
  191:             ],
  192:     %% ok, now do the plan from above
  193:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
  194:     escalus_connection:stop(Conn).
  195: 
  196: should_fail_with_sslv3(Config) ->
  197:     %% GIVEN
  198:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  199:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, sslv3),
  200:     %% WHEN
  201:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1) of
  202:     %% THEN
  203:         _ ->
  204:             error(client_connected_using_sslv3)
  205:     catch
  206:         error:closed ->
  207:             ok
  208:     end.
  209: 
  210: should_pass_with_tlsv1(Config) ->
  211:     should_pass_with_tls(tlsv1, Config).
  212: 
  213: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.1'(Config) ->
  214:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.1', Config).
  215: 
  216: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.2'(Config) ->
  217:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.2', Config).
  218: 
  219: should_pass_with_tls(Version, Config)->
  220:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  221:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, Version),
  222: 
  223:     %% WHEN
  224:     Result = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1),
  225: 
  226:     %% THEN
  227:     ?assertMatch({ok, _, _, _}, Result).
  228: 
  229: should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls(Config) ->
  230:     %% GIVEN
  231:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  232:     {Conn, Props, Features} = start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec),
  233: 
  234:     %% WHEN
  235:     try escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props, Features) of
  236:     %% THEN
  237:         _ ->
  238:             error(authentication_without_tls_suceeded)
  239:     catch
  240:         throw:{auth_failed, User, AuthReply} ->
  241:             ?assertEqual(atom_to_binary(?SECURE_USER, utf8), User),
  242:             escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"policy-violation">>,
  243:                                              <<"Use of STARTTLS required">>],
  244:                            AuthReply)
  245:     end.
  246: 
  247: should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required(Config) ->
  248:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  249:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, [start_stream]),
  250:     Features = case escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, wait_for_features) of
  251:         #xmlel{name = <<"stream:features">>, children = Children} -> Children;
  252:         #xmlel{name = <<"features">>, children = Children} -> Children
  253:     end,
  254:     ?assertMatch([#xmlel{name = <<"starttls">>,
  255:                          children = [#xmlel{name = <<"required">>}]}],
  256:                  Features).
  257: 
  258: clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers(Config) ->
  259:     ?assert(length(ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)) > 0).
  260: 
  261: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA'(Config) ->
  262:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA",
  263:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  264: 
  265: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'(Config) ->
  266:     ?assertEqual(["DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA"],
  267:                  ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)).
  268: 
  269: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA'(Config) ->
  270:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA",
  271:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  272: 
  273: 
  274: reset_stream_noproc(Config) ->
  275:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  276:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  277:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  278:                end,
  279:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  280:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  281: 
  282:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  283:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  284:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  285:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  286:     %% Add auth element into message queue of the c2s process
  287:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  288:     ?assertThrow({timeout, auth_reply}, escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props)),
  289:     %% Sim client disconnection
  290:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  291:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  292:     %% Resume
  293:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  294:     receive
  295:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  296:             ok;
  297:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  298:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  299:         after 5000 ->
  300:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  301:     end,
  302:     ok.
  303: 
  304: starttls_noproc(Config) ->
  305:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  306:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  307:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  308:                end,
  309:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  310:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  311: 
  312:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  313:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  314:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  315:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  316:     %% Add starttls element into message queue of the c2s process
  317:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  318:     ?assertThrow({timeout, proceed}, escalus_session:starttls(Conn, Props)),
  319:     %% Sim client disconnection
  320:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  321:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  322:     %% Resume
  323:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  324:     receive
  325:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  326:             ok;
  327:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  328:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  329:         after 5000 ->
  330:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  331:     end,
  332:     ok.
  333: 
  334: compress_noproc(Config) ->
  335:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  336:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  337:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  338:                end,
  339:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  340:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  341: 
  342:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  343:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  344:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  345:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  346:     %% Add compress element into message queue of the c2s process
  347:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  348:     ?assertThrow({timeout, compressed},
  349:                  escalus_session:compress(Conn, [{compression, <<"zlib">>}|Props])),
  350:     %% Sim client disconnection
  351:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  352:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  353:     %% Resume
  354:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  355:     receive
  356:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  357:             ok;
  358:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  359:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  360:         after 5000 ->
  361:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  362:     end,
  363:     ok.
  364: 
  365: %% Tests featuress advertisement
  366: stream_features_test(Config) ->
  367:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  368:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  369:     List = [start_stream, stream_features, {?MODULE, verify_features}],
  370:     escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, List),
  371:     ok.
  372: 
  373: verify_features(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  374:     %% should not advertise compression before tls
  375:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(compression, Features)),
  376:     %% start tls. Starttls should be then removed from list and compression should be added
  377:     {Conn1, Props1} = escalus_session:starttls(Conn, Props),
  378:     {Conn2, Props2, Features2} = escalus_session:stream_features(Conn1, Props1, []),
  379:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(starttls, Features2)),
  380:     ?assert(false =/= has_feature(compression, Features2)),
  381:     %% start compression. Compression should be then removed from list
  382:     {Conn3, Props3, Features3} = escalus_session:authenticate(Conn2, Props2, Features2),
  383:     {Conn4, Props4} = escalus_session:compress(Conn3, Props3),
  384:     {Conn5, Props5, Features4} = escalus_session:stream_features(Conn4, Props4, []),
  385:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(compression, Features4)),
  386:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(starttls, Features4)),
  387:     {Conn5, Props5, Features4}.
  388: 
  389: has_feature(Feature, FeatureList) ->
  390:     {_, Value} = lists:keyfind(Feature, 1, FeatureList),
  391:     Value.
  392: 
  393: %% should fail
  394: tls_compression_authenticate_fail(Config) ->
  395:     %% Given
  396:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  397:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  398:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, maybe_use_compression, authenticate],
  399:     %% when and then
  400:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps) of
  401:         _ ->
  402:             error(compression_without_auth_suceeded)
  403:     catch
  404:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_compressed, Stanza, _} ->
  405:             case Stanza of
  406:                 #xmlel{name = <<"failure">>} ->
  407:                     ok;
  408:                 _ ->
  409:                     error(unknown_compression_response)
  410:             end
  411:     end.
  412: 
  413: tls_authenticate_compression(Config) ->
  414:     %% Given
  415:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  416:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  417:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, authenticate, maybe_use_compression],
  418:     %% then
  419:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  420:     % when and then
  421:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  422:     SSL = Conn#client.ssl,
  423:     ?assert(false =/= Compress),
  424:     ?assert(false =/= SSL).
  425: 
  426: tls_authenticate(Config) ->
  427:     %% Given
  428:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  429:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  430:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, authenticate],
  431:     %% then
  432:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  433:     % when,
  434:     SSL = Conn#client.ssl,
  435:     ?assert(false =/= SSL).
  436: 
  437: %% should fail
  438: tls_compression_fail(Config) ->
  439:     %% Given
  440:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  441:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  442:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, maybe_use_compression],
  443:     %% then and when
  444:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps) of
  445:         _ ->
  446:             error(compression_without_auth_suceeded)
  447:     catch
  448:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_compressed, Stanza, _} ->
  449:             case Stanza of
  450:                 #xmlel{name = <<"failure">>} ->
  451:                     ok;
  452:                 _ ->
  453:                     error(unknown_compression_response)
  454:             end
  455:     end.
  456: 
  457: auth_compression_bind_session(Config) ->
  458:     %% Given
  459:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  460:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  461:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl,
  462:         authenticate, maybe_use_compression, bind, session],
  463:     %% then
  464:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  465:     % when
  466:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  467:     ?assert(false =/= Compress).
  468: 
  469: auth_bind_compression_session(Config) ->
  470:     %% Given
  471:     Config1 = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{?SECURE_USER, 1}]),
  472:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config1, ?SECURE_USER),
  473:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl,
  474:         authenticate, bind, maybe_use_compression, session],
  475:     %% then
  476:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  477:     % when
  478:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  479:     ?assert(false =/= Compress).
  480: 
  481: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  482: %% Internal functions
  483: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  484: 
  485: c2s_port(Config) ->
  486:     case ?config(c2s_port, Config) of
  487:         undefined -> 5223;
  488:         Value -> Value
  489:     end.
  490: 
  491: ciphers_available_in_os() ->
  492:     CiphersStr = os:cmd("openssl ciphers 'ALL:eNULL'"),
  493:     [string:strip(C, both, $\n) || C <- string:tokens(CiphersStr, ":")].
  494: 
  495: ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config) ->
  496:     Port = c2s_port(Config),
  497:     lists:filter(fun(Cipher) ->
  498:                          openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port)
  499:                  end, ciphers_available_in_os()).
  500: 
  501: openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port) ->
  502:     PortStr = integer_to_list(Port),
  503:     Cmd = "echo '' | openssl s_client -connect localhost:" ++ PortStr ++
  504:         " -cipher " "\"" ++ Cipher ++ "\" 2>&1"
  505:         " | grep 'Cipher is " ++ Cipher ++ "'",
  506:     [] =/= os:cmd(Cmd).
  507: 
  508: restore_ejabberd_node(Config) ->
  509:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Config),
  510:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd).
  511: 
  512: assert_cert_file_exists() ->
  513:     ejabberd_node_utils:file_exists(?CERT_FILE) orelse
  514:         ct:fail("cert file ~s not exists", [?CERT_FILE]).
  515: 
  516: config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, Fun) ->
  517:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file([Fun()], Config).
  518: 
  519: mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern() ->
  520:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, tls,"}.
  521: 
  522: mk_value_for_compression_config_pattern() ->
  523:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, starttls_required,  {zlib, 10000},"}.
  524: 
  525: mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern() ->
  526:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, starttls_required,"}.
  527: 
  528: set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec, Version) ->
  529:     [{ssl_opts, [{versions, [Version]}]} | UserSpec].
  530: 
  531: start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec) ->
  532:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_compression],
  533:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec,
  534:                                                             ConnetctionSteps),
  535:     {Conn, Props, Features}.
  536: 
  537: connect_to_invalid_host(Spec) ->
  538:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_to_invalid_host}]),
  539:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  540: 
  541: connect_to_invalid_host(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  542:     escalus:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:stream_start(<<"hopefullynonexistentdomain">>,
  543:                                                    ?NS_JABBER_CLIENT)),
  544:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  545: 
  546: connect_with_bad_xml(Spec) ->
  547:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_with_bad_xml}]),
  548:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  549: 
  550: connect_with_bad_xml(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  551:     escalus_connection:send(Conn, #xmlcdata{content = "asdf\n"}),
  552:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  553: 
  554: connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec) ->
  555:     F = fun (Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  556:                 Start = stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(escalus_users:get_server([], Spec)),
  557:                 escalus:send(Conn, Start),
  558:                 {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}
  559:         end,
  560:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [F]),
  561:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  562: 
  563: stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(To) ->
  564:     legacy_stream_helper:stream_start(lists:keystore(stream_ns, 1, default_context(To),
  565:                                 {stream_ns, <<"obviously-invalid-namespace">>})).
  566: 
  567: default_context(To) ->
  568:     [{version, <<"version='1.0'">>},
  569:      {to, To},
  570:      {stream_ns, ?NS_XMPP}].
  571: 
  572: children_specs_to_pids(Children) ->
  573:     [Pid || {_, Pid, _, _} <- Children].
